item.title: Here are the 3 things we're watching in the stock market in the week ahead
item.description: Earnings from CrowdStrike, Broadcom and Costco are in focus. Jobs data also will command Wall Street's attention.

item.title: WBD adds 6.4 million Max subscribers, forecasts 150 million subs by end of 2026
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery said Thursday it added 6.4 million global streaming subscribers in the fourth quarter for a total of 116.9 million subscribers.

item.title: Dell forecasts $15 billion of AI server sales this year
item.description: Dell said that it sold about $10 billion of AI-optimized servers in its fiscal 2025, and expects to sell about $15 billion in AI system sales this yea...

item.title: Snowflake gains more than 4% on earnings beat as company expands AI push
item.description: Snowflake announced an expanded partnership with Microsoft Azure to offer access to OpenAI models on Wednesday.

item.title: Nvidia sales grow 78% on AI demand, company gives strong guidance
item.description: Nvidia reported fourth-quarter earnings that beat Wall Street expectations. The company also provided strong guidance for the current quarter.
